comments.content: Loos a lot like customized Bodoni Poster.
Thanks, that worked just fine with a few easy tweaks.

What? We can’t run with this? Let’s really get a Letterman’s Top Ten Font List.

#!0. You learn that you’re on a typographer’s “S” list when you suggest Comic Sans for your corporate logo.
That ’T’ used for both ’Top’ and ’Ten’ is such a striking and incredibly clever design. This should go in a design annual or award show… :^P
